name: pagan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging or relating to a religion that worships many gods, especially one that existed before the main world religions: a pagan religion The Easter egg has both pagan and Christian origins.
belonging or relating to a modern religion that includes beliefs and activities that are not from any of the main religions of the world, for example the worship of nature: The wedding was a pagan ceremony held in a forest. a pagan festival
